radiographic_examinations.findings: Inflammatory changes in the right lower quadrant adjacent to a dilated hyperemic 7 mm appendix. Small rim enhancing collection measuring 1.3 x 1.3 x 2.2 cm. No free air. No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. No focal lesions in the liver, pancreas, spleen, kidneys or adrenal glands. Normal urinary bladder and distal ureters. No free fluid in the pelvis. Mild atherosclerotic disease noted.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Degree of inflammatory changes have improved compared to prior CT.
